com.netflix.governator.lifecycle

Class FilteredLifecycleListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.governator.lifecycle.FilteredLifecycleListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LifecycleListener

    public class FilteredLifecycleListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements LifecycleListener
    Wrapper listener that forwards to the provided listener only when the obj is in one of the specified base packages.
